overview.text: Joy, vitality, clarity, and wholehearted success. The Sun upright emphasizes genuine progress over noise. Major Arcana archetype gives the tone and terrain. Expect to work with joy shared, playful dates, and celebrate together; use what already responds and let momentum build. Read this card as permission to move in a way that feels honest and well‑paced—visible results over grand gestures.

relationships.text: Connection feels alive and honest. Let joy shared, playful dates, and celebrate together guide how you show up; small, sincere acts matter here. Speak plainly, listen for the quiet truth, and move at a pace that keeps trust intact.

work.text: Progress favors craft, clear scope, and a result you can point to. Build around public wins, showcase results, and raise standards kindly; finish one meaningful piece and let it prove the direction. Share early, revise well, and protect time where real work happens.

finance.text: Make numbers you can live with and choices you respect. Aim resources toward healthy surplus, invest in vitality, and gratitude budget; trim what does not serve your life. Automate the good, read terms in daylight, and let steadiness quietly win.

health.text: Prefer routines your body trusts. Shape your week around sunlit movement, outdoors time, and simple pleasures; keep changes gentle and repeatable. Recovery is part of progress; consistency outperforms intensity.

overview.text: Joy, vitality, clarity, and wholehearted success. The Sun reversed highlights where the current pulls against you. Major Arcana archetype frames where to look first. You may notice overexposure, ego softening, and find sincere joy; naming it clearly is half the remedy. The correction is measured and specific: simplify, realign, and restore trust in the basics before scaling up again.

relationships.text: Tension and mixed signals steal warmth—name what’s real. Name overexposure, ego softening, and find sincere joy without blame; set one boundary and one invitation, then observe. Slow the pace, remove pressure, and let sincerity reset the tone.

work.text: Drag shows up as too much scope and not enough finish. Cut to hype vs substance, return to craft, and protect energy; deliver a small slice that restores flow. Reduce handoffs, limit multitasking, and make quality visible.

finance.text: Leaks appear when decisions rush through fog. Tighten around status spending, reconnect to meaning, and moderate outflow; pause non‑essentials until the plan is clear. Choose clarity over speed and rebuild stability step by step.

health.text: Overreach or neglect hide in routine—bring them into the light. Ease into burnout glow, rest and shade, and play without pressure; lower intensity, improve form, and rest on purpose. Start where you are; a kinder plan will carry you further.
